resources.string:
This app was made by Nitya, a student passionate about science education. 

Her non-profit organisation, VidyaVerse works with children to teach them applied STEM in innovative ways. Their aim to foster long lasting curiosity and a passion for discovery and innovation in every child. 

You can view the Vidyaverse website at www.vidyaverse.org

Read more articles and ask us your questions at our STEM Blog: www.vidyaverse.org/zenith 

Write to Nitya at: 
nitya.agarwala@gmail.com
